alert.note: Alert for Charles (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 01 at 10:45AM EST until March 01 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Charles and King George Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 1 PM EST this afternoon, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.5 feet, water reaches yards near Cobb Island and docks near Dahlgren. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Goose Bay is at 11:34 AM and 12:18 AM. The next high tide at Dahlgren is at 11:03 PM and 11:25 AM. The next high tide at Indian Head is at 3:28 PM and 4:12 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Upper Machodoc Creek at Dahlgren MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 7.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 3.1 ft, Major 5.1 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/10 AM 3.6 1.7 2.2 1.0 Minor 01/10 PM 3.2 1.3 2.1 0.5 None 02/11 AM 3.3 1.4 1.9 0.5 None 02/11 PM 2.9 1.0 1.7 0.5 None 03/01 PM 3.4 1.5 2.0 1.0 None 04/12 AM 3.9 2.0 2.6 1.0 Minor &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
